channel.title: How do I get an ip adress for my server?
channel.description: Can anyone help? I'm new at making servers...

item.title: How do I get an ip adress for my server?
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:15, topic:357482”][quote author=shadyz link=topic=453992.msg3325618#msg3325618 date=1283081308]
i have question did they can hack my copmuter with this ip?
[/quote]Nobody can hack your IP with just your address.[/quote]

he’s correct you can be DDoS’d (Basically when a person sends packets from his zombie’s connections at a high frequency to slow down your internet and disconnect it), but just don’t let others find out your IP willingly. People CAN find it though.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get an ip adress for my server?

  2. give those players your IP adress and let them change the current IP adress to yours.

item.title: How do I get an ip adress for my server?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

if you are hosting the server for youself and a few other persons , this is what you do.
go to that site i gave you.
give those persons your IP adress.
make them change the current IP adress to yours.
you have to play on localhost ( 127.0.0.1 )
they have to play on the IP adress you wil give them.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get an ip adress for my server?

item.title: How do I get an ip adress for my server?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Cres is correct. However, if you really want to get a server going, you need to set a DNS redirect, in case your external IP changes.
